short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add VAT to a price or take VAT off a price in a few keystrokes with our handy universal VAT calculator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VAT or Value-added Tax is a financial practice aimed towards everything consumption-related. Though this tax is not universal, most European countries have it in place. 

Calculating VAT can be a chore for individuals who are not very informed or interested in this subject, but that can change by using various apps. Universal VAT calculator is one such example, helping users calculate their VAT.

The calculator VAT rate is by default set to 20%, but you can change it. Moreover, you can input whatever VAT value you wish.

Universal VAT calculator is a quick and efficient tool for calculating how much money you pay for a certain product.
